column1: Az. a bendlet (bend V*.) betw. two swans arg. ducally gorged and lined or.

column1: Az. a bend engr. arg. betw. two swans ppr. (sometimes crowned and) chained or.

Az. a bend wavy or betw. two swans arg. membered of the second.
column2: Jenison, co. Lincoln; co. Nottingham; Itheston, co. Northampton; co. York; and Wales.

column1: Az. a bend or betw. two swans ppr.

column1: Az. a bend or betw. three cocks arg.
Arg. a bend betw. three eagles displ. sa.
column2: Page or Paige, co. Devon. Popelley. Popley.

column1: Or a bendlet (or baston) gu. betw. three eagles close sa.
column2: Witheam, co. York, V. Witham, V.

column1: Or a bendlet (or baston) gu. betw. three eagles close in trian aspect sa.

Gu. a bend betw. in chief two hawks and in base another or.
Az. a bend betw. three lapwings arg.

Az. a bend engr. betw. three martlets arg.

column2: Witham, Cliffe, co. York; originally of co. Lincoln; quartering Wauton, Wycliffe, and Meaburn. Witham, Headlam and Lartington Hall, co. York.

column1: Arg. a bend betw. six storks sa.
.... a bend .... betw. six martlets ....
column2: Sir Richard de la Mare, co. Hereford.

column1: Arg. a bend betw. six martlets gu.
column2: Sire Thomas de Forneval, N. Thomas de Fournval, K. Sr. Thomas Fournivall, H, or Funivall, J. Furneval. Monsire de Furnevall, Y. Furnival, quartered by TAlbot Earl of Shrewsbury, U. Gerard de Furnivall, E. Sr. Thomas Furnivall, V. Furnivall, co. Hertford, temp. Henry III. Le Sire de Furnivall, Y. Walter de Furnivall, C. Thomas Furnyvall, B. Hulgrave, co. Chester. Hulgreve, Beverton, co. Chester, V. Tempest. Thaworth. And with a label az. William Furnivall, B. The label of three points. Furnivall, co. Hertford, temp. Henry III.

column1: Arg. a bend betw. six martlets gu. over all a crosier or.
column2: Priory of Austin Canons at Radford or Wirkesop co. Nottingham.
